text: Steppe Dawns () is a 1953 Soviet drama movie directed by Lev Saakov.СТЕПНЫЕ ЗОРИ It stars Iya Arepina, Lev Frichinsky, and Nikolay Moskalenko. The movie is based on the eponymous novel by Boris Bedny. ==Actors== * Iya Arepina as Varya * Lev Frichinsky as Styopa * Nikolay Moskalenko as Alexey * Yuriy Sarantsev as Pshenytsyn * Georgi Gumilevsky as Pavel == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1953 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Steppe Dawns
